name: Otherside (Minyth)
description:
A fairly short visual novel about trying to find your missing friends. You will find yourself in a strange house with a mysterious man. 

I tasked myself to create a visual novel within a week! This is my first project. It contains 7 endings.

Estimated playtime: 20-40 mins

Warning: Contains blood, some violence, and a knife.

Credits: All sound effects are from https://freesound.org/
